title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3297/89 of 31 October 1989 amending certain "guide" quantities provided for in Regulation (EEC) No 3972/88 under the supplementary mechanism applicable to trade in beef and veal
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 3297/89
of 31 October 1989
amending certain 'guide' quantities provided for in Regulation (EEC) No 3972/88 under the supplementary mechanism applicable to trade in beef and veal
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. For meat of animals of the bovine species, fresh or chilled, the 'guide' quantity laid down in the Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 3972/88 may be exceeded by 1 500 tonnes equivalent carcase weight.
2. For live animals of the bovine species, the 'guide' quantity laid down in the Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 3972/88 may be exceeded by 11 500 head.
3. The figure '20 %' in Article 6 of Regulation (EEC) No 3972/88 shall be calculated on the basis of the 'guide' quantities originally laid down in the Annex to that Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 November 1989.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 31 October 1989.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
